statements: DELETE FROM preoperative_imaging_data WHERE image_type = 'MRI' AND image_size > 1000
DELETE FROM imaging_data WHERE patient_id = 101 AND imaging_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM navigation_data WHERE navigation_mode = 'Manual' AND timestamp < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM navigation_data WHERE navigation_mode = 'Live' AND timestamp < '2022-05-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM Surgical_Navigation WHERE procedure_type = 'Orthopedic Surgery';
DELETE FROM Preoperative_Imaging WHERE patient_id = 123 AND image_type = 'CT';
DELETE FROM surgery_data WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM imaging_data WHERE patient_id = 100 AND imaging_type = 'X-ray';
